tool.name: eeo_summary

param.name: in_Bounds
param.dialogReference: Input Boundary polygon layer. The summary fields will be added to this layer.

param.name: fld_ID
param.dialogReference:
ID field in the boundary polygons.

The EO summary is calculated across the polygon(s) sharing a unique ID in this field. Note that this means that all polygons with the same ID will have the same EO summary. You may want to dissolve boundary polygons prior to usage in this tool.

param.name: in_EOs
param.dialogReference: Prioritized EOs, which are output from the Conservation Portfolio Tools -> Build Conservation Portfolio tool.

param.name: summary_type
param.dialogReference:
Type of summary fields to add:

  • Text: a single text summary field

  • Numeric: multiple numeric count fields (one for each Tier)

  • Both: both a text summary and numeric count fields

Note that Numeric fields have fixed names.

param.name: out_field
param.dialogReference: Name of the new Text field to be added. Will be overwritten if it already exists.

param.name: slopFactor
param.dialogReference: Maximum distance at which EOs are considered to be associated with boundary polygons (i.e. a "slop factor").

tool.summary: Summarize EOs by conservation prioritization tier in provided boundary polygons.
